title: Top Apple Shareholders
snippet: Jeff Williams, the COO at Apple, owned 389,944 shares of Apple stock as of Jan. 2, 2025. Mr. Williams oversees Apple’s global operations and the development of Apple Watch and Apple's health initiatives.

title: Apple Inc.: Shareholders, Shareholding Structure - MarketScreener
snippet: Find the distribution by types of shareholders of Apple Inc. listed on the Nasdaq stock exchange. Discover the geographical origin of the shareholders of Apple Inc..

title: Apple Stock Ownership - Who Owns Apple in 2025? | WallStreetZen
snippet: Apple (NASDAQ: AAPL) is owned by 62.05% institutional shareholders, 0.12% Apple insiders, and 37.83% retail investors. Vanguard Group Inc is the largest individual Apple shareholder, owning 1.40B shares representing 9.47% of the company.

title: Apple Inc.: Top Shareholders and Capital Structure | Eqvista
snippet: The company’s ownership structure is characterized by institutional investors, with over 60% of shares held by major investment firms, while retail investors maintain a substantial 51.43% stake.

title: Apple Inc. (AAPL) Stock Major Holders - Yahoo Finance
snippet: Find out the direct holders, institutional holders and mutual fund holders for Apple Inc. (AAPL).
